status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
ignoreError = #{ignoreerror,jdbcType=BIT},
replay = #{replay,jdbcType=BIT},
replaySize = #{replaysize,jdbcType=INTEGER},

select.if:
select job.id as value ,job.name,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_sql_query job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_elasticSearch job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_exeShell job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_hive job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_sqoop job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_sftp job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_sql_insert_update job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_sql job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_data_export job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_data_import job where job.`status`=1
select job.id as value ,job.name ,#{type} as type from t_sys_timer_job_mongo_query job where job.`status`=1
and job.groupname=#{groupname}
and job.createuser=#{createuser}
and job.id = #{jobid}
ORDER BY type ,value

mapper.select:
select * from v_workflow_type where 1=1
and value = #{id}
